channel.title: Err. O.o
channel.description: So I went to login and my password was changed. o_o I haven't logged in for 48 hours on minecraft, but my password was compramized? :o Hmmm. Ehh. It's re-set now. And I guess that's good. Hope to see it back up. :) I have 3 days before I go on my week vaction. :P

item.title: Err. O.o
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Shadowpwns:

I didn’t log into the server. I wasn’t on the last 48 hours. xD But I still got my password changed. And I didn’t even know my e-mails. xD

As said to others. Your password was not changed. MITB wrote a script (after finding out passwords were viewable and shutting down the server) to blank out everybodies password who had a minecraft username set in their profile. Doesn’t matter if you have ever logged into the server, just on the fact you had a username set in your profile.

Read full topic

Server is offline.
